name: Helen Zhou
bio: Hello everyone! I am a sophomore majoring in SDS and Sociology. I use she/her pronouns. It's so nice to meet you all!

name: Radiah Khan
bio: Hi everyone! I am currently a sophomore double majoring in Statistical and Data Sciences and Quantitative Economics here at Smith College. I am born and raised in Dhaka, Bangladesh. My research interests include : social media usage around the world, AI, and understanding social issues through computation.

name: Kiara Sunil Sing
bio: Hi everyone! I am currently a sophomore at Smith College majoring in Computer Science and Quantitative Economics. I am originally from Utah and have interests in open source AI, visual analytics, and exploring the intersection of technology and the community.
